code: var FetchApi=function FetchApi(url,method){var headers=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:{};var body=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:{};return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){if(method==='GET'){fetch(url).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){resolve(data);}).catch(function(error){reject(error);console.log('Network Error',error);});}else{fetch(url,{method:method,headers:headers,body:JSON.stringify(body)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){resolve(data);}).catch(function(error){reject(error);console.log('Network Error',error);});}});};export default FetchApi;
